cast.name: 诺帕奇·贾亚纳玛 Nopachai Jayanama
琵雅缇达·米提拉荣 Piyathida Mittiraroch
阿帕丝拉·勒帕塞特 Apasra Lertprasert

awards:
第22届泰国电影金天鹅奖(2013)
　　最佳影片(提名)
　　最佳导演(提名) Saranyoo Jiralak
　　最佳女配角 琵雅缇达·米提拉荣
　　最佳摄影(提名) Pramett Chankrasse
　　最佳剪辑(提名) Sasikarn Suwansuthi
introduction: Set in Rayong Province, "Together" tells three stories of love linked by rain. In the first story, a married woman (played by Thai Princee Ubol Ratana) is visited by the father who abandoned her as a child, currently alone and suffering from Alzheimer's disease. In the second, a young professional couple is having marital difficulties when the husband suddenly begins going blind. In the third, a pair of high-school sweethearts find out the girl is pregnant way before the couple are ready to be parents.
